This document tracks trust and safety related work for the Vercel platform.

## Admin Dashboard Population

**Task**: Populate the trust and safety page at admin.vercel.com

**Reference**: https://admin.vercel.com/team/team_nLlpyC6REAqxydlFKbrMDlud/trust-and-safety

### Requirements

To be determined - this page needs to be populated with appropriate trust and safety information, controls, and settings for team administrators.

2. Design the page layout and user interface
